body.S: One of the easiest ways to exercise is to start walking on a regular basis. Walking is good for everyone!

To bring yourself a greater sense of calm and motivation today, try quietly meditating or praying for five minutes. It will not take too much time out of your day, and you might notice a major mood change!
What activities make you feel most calm and peaceful? Can you try one of these activities today?
Today, try to practice deep, slow breathing for two minutes while closing your eyes. Do you feel calmer or more at peace afterwards?
To reduce stress, try writing down or thinking about a more positive way to look at something you have been struggling with lately.
It is easy to become stressed out during the day without realizing it. Today, try to take a break from what you are doing for even one minute, close your eyes, and breathe deeply.
Is there a peaceful place near where you live that you could visit today or tomorrow? Purposefully seeking out peace in itself can be calming.
